_sText:
‡BUSES FROM HELL‡

-------REDUX-------

+ABOUT+ This is the third and final rendition of buses_from_hell. It has been completely remade from scratch. I hope you enjoy it! +HOW TO PLAY+ Counter-Terrorists: Survive in the arena for 90 seconds while avoiding the buses from hell! Terrorists: Climb up the towers to take control of the buses from hell! Use them to smash and maim the Counter-Terrorists!

WASD to drive the bus. Left Click for powers!

+FEATURES+ -Two NEW buses:

"The Short Bus" - Left Click to send players and objects flying! - HIGH DAMAGE

"The Bus from Hell" - Left Click to shoot cannon balls! - HIGH STRENGTH

-Added electric walls -Added more cars and objects -Added visible countdown timer -Added more dramatic T destruction sequence -Updated graphics and skybox -AND A LOT MORE! +NOTES+ I highly recommend these server CVARs: mp_limitteams 64 mp_autoteambalance 0 mp_freezetime 0 Also, the map is 3mb so use .bz2 on your server!
